configuration.application_title: COVID-19 Medical Resource Demand Dashboard - Virginia

scenarios.description: The Adaptive Fitting Projection model fits each county precisely, using recent trends to guide the future projections. This scenario assumes typical COVID-19 hospitalizations last about 8 days. Updated 2020-09-22.

The Adaptive-Low Fitting Projection model fits each county precisely, using recent trends to guide the future projections. This scenario assumes typical COVID-19 hospitalizations last about 8 days. Updated 2020-09-22.

The Adaptive-High Fitting Projection model fits each county precisely, using recent trends to guide the future projections. This scenario assumes typical COVID-19 hospitalizations last about 8 days. Updated 2020-09-22.
